explains: v. 走私，偷运；偷偷携带，夹带

sentences.en: They deny conspiring together to smuggle drugs.
sentences.cn: 他们否认共谋走私毒品。

sentences.en: They were foiled in their attempt to smuggle the paintings.
sentences.cn: 他们走私绘画作品的企图未能得逞。

sentences.en: Customs officials foiled an attempt to smuggle the paintings out of the country.
sentences.cn: 海关关员阻截了一次企图走私画作出境的阴谋。
